description: Integrate timestamp.py and remove-emojis.py utilities into document generation workflow to ensure all generated docs have proper RSMS/UDS-compliant timestamps and are emoji-free
goal: Ensure all generated documentation follows timestamp standards (RSMS v2.0, UDS) and enforce no-emoji policy across all generated content
requirements: Update all doc generators (foundation_generator.py, changelog_generator.py, etc.) to use timestamp.py for frontmatter
Add validation in generators to check for emojis before writing files
Integrate remove-emojis.py as pre-generation cleanup tool
Update global documentation standards to explicitly forbid emojis
Add timestamp validation in UDS validators
out_of_scope: Retroactive emoji removal from existing docs (manual cleanup only)
Timestamp migration for legacy docs without frontmatter
Runtime emoji detection in user-provided content
Custom timestamp formats beyond RSMS/UDS standards
constraints: Must not break existing generator APIs
Timestamp format must match RSMS v2.0 and UDS schemas exactly
No new external dependencies beyond existing Python stdlib
Backward compatible with docs that don't have timestamps yet
